articles.title: Italy's largest lake wilts in Europe's heatwave - The Independent
articles.description: The lake is losing 2cm of water a day
articles.content:
It is the largest lake in Italy, mythlogised by the Romans and the Germans, and a magnet for tourists and modern-day celebrities.
But Italys worst drought in decades has reduced water levels at Lake… [+223 chars]

articles.title: Inside the Ukraine power plant raising the specter of nuclear disaster in Europe - CNN
articles.description: Every day Olga is bused from her home in the Russian-occupied town of Enerhodar, on the banks of the Dnipro River in southeastern Ukraine, to the nearby Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant where she works.

articles.title: Three Stars from Day 4 of WJC: Lysell, Sweden dominate all-European action - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: On an all-European afternoon, Fabian Lysell made his experience of North American ice felt. The winger made sure to remind hockey fans that the Boston Bruins drafted him in the first round of the 2021 NHL Draft.
articles.content:
Sweden made its presence felt in an all-European matchday at the 2022 World Juniors.
